title: Mirrha the mother of Adonis: or, Lustes prodegies. By William Barksted. Horrace. Nansicetur enim pretium, nomenque poet√¶. Whereunto are added certaine Eglogs. By L.M.
author: Barksted, William, fl. 1611.
publisher: Printed by E. A[llde] for Iohn Bache, and are to be sold at his shop in the Popes-head Palace, nere the Royall Exchange,
